phrases: The world has become a superhuman society,
and about 80 of the world's population now has some kind of special trait.
In this world swirling with chaos,
the profession that everyone once dreamed about and admired
came into the limelight.
Heroes of justice fighting villains and saving people from distress.
Yes, this is the story of how I became the greatest hero.
Everybody, sorry for the long wait!
The stage that was frozen in the second match
is finally dry, so on to the next match!
The assassin from Class B!
Pretty things have thorns, you know!
From the hero course, it is Ibara Shiozaki!
Versus-
Sparking Killing Boy!
From the hero course, it is Denki Kaminari!
Battle on, Challengers!
Now, we will have a super flashy battle this time too-
Um...
Please excuse the interruption.
What do you mean by assassin?
I have only come to find victory, not to take my opponent's life.
I-I am sorry!
In the first place, I wished to enter YOU.A.
High School not for wicked reasons,
but for the salvation of others...
I said, I am sorry!
My bad, okay?!
I thank you for your understanding.
Class B has people like this in it, too, huh?
She is got big eyes and a pretty face,
but it looks like she is really strong.
I have got to discharge all my electricity here, huh?
Actually, she is pretty, but she is also kind of cute...
I have got to ask her out sometime, huh?
All right...!
A-Anyway, start!
When this is over, want to grab a bite to eat?
I will comfort you if you will have me.
Because this match'll probably be over in a second!
Indiscriminate Shock...
It was decided in an instant!
I will say it once more!
An instant!
Shiozaki advances to the second round!
Oh, I was able to make the most of the opportunity I was given.
Ibara Shiozaki Quirk: Vines
Ibara Shiozaki.
Quirk: Vines!
The vines on her head are extendable!
They are detachable, too!
As long as she makes sure to get plenty of water and sunlight,
they will grow in almost immediately.
In other words, she cannot go bald!
All right!
Good job, Shiozaki!
Man...
What is that?
Did not he say he would settle this in a second?
That is strange, he was defeated in a second, was not he?
Class A is supposed to be better than Class B, so is not that weird?
Sorry!
What was that just now?
Kamui, Kamui!
Would not she be good as a sidekick?
Yeah.
I wish I could have gotten a better look.
She seems straight-laced, but she is cute!
Hey, get back to work.
It was hard to deal with Shiozaki's ability to detach her vines, huh?
The vines were able not only to defend but also to act as an electrical ground.
There was no way he would shock her with that.
And then she extended her vines to bind him.
Kaminari's Quirk was completely blocked.
Some Quirks do not work well against others,
but it would have been better if he would been able to deal with it...
Kaminari's Quirk is supposed to be strong,
but Shiozaki is a strong opponent who placed fourth in the entrance exam.
mutter mutter mutter
Vines, huh?
I wonder if it is like Kamui Woods's Quirk.
Binding types really are strong.
I hardly ever see anyone break out.
It would be impossible to get close while avoiding all those vines,
so you would either have to tear them off or get through with brute force...
Oh, but in order to keep you from doing that, she would go after your hands first...
Umm...
mutter mutter mutter
You just finished, but you are already thinking about countermeasures, huh?
Oh, no!
It is just, I mean, this is pretty much my hobby...
It is not every day I get a chance to see amazing Quirks outside of those in our class...
Oh, right!
I have been putting these together for everyone in Class A, too.
For your Zero Gravity, too!
Deku, you have been amazing since I met you,
but the sports festival is making me think that you are amazing all over again.
Now, it is time for the fourth match!
We are just going to keep rolling along!
Rush headlong toward the top!
It is like he is the epitome of the middle of the pack!
From the hero course, it is Tenya Iida!
Versus-
Fully-equipped with support items!
From the support course, it is Mei Hatsume!
He is up against the support course, huh?
I wonder what kind of fight it will be?
I mean, what is that?
Iida's also fully-equipped with support items!
That is generally against the rules for those in the hero course.
Those who must use equipment needed to petition beforehand.
I forgot about that!
Aoyama also wore a belt, so I thought it was fine!
He submitted a petition.
I humbly apologize!
However, my heart was moved by my opponent's sportsmanship.
Even though she is from the support course,
she said she wanted an even match since she made it this far.
She said she wanted to fight fairly.
So, she gave me this equipment!
I did not think I could ignore her fighting spirit!
Oh, youth!
I will allow it!
So it is fine?
Well, if they both agree on it, then it is within regulations...
I guess?
Hero Analysis for the Future
Is Hatsume someone who would say that?
Could it be...?
Well, since permission's been granted, let us start the fourth match!
Is not that acceleration wonderful, Iida?
A mic?
Why?
She is wearing speakers?
Do not your legs feel lighter than usual?
That is only to be expected!
Those leg parts are helping the wearer's movements along!
And I...
The support companies are sitting...
Oh, they are biting!
I have got'them!
Mei Hatsume Quirk: Zoom
Mei Hatsume.
Quirk: Zoom.
If she gets serious, she can see clearly up to five kilometer's away!
Since I have got sensors in every direction,
I can even deal with attacks from behind!
What are you planning?
Iida changed course adeptly!
It is thanks to the auto-balancer that I made!
-What is this...?
-The leg parts detect the wearer's brainwaves to predict their movements,
-She is very good at hard selling...
-The leg parts detect the wearer's brainwaves to predict their movements,
so there is no need to worry about time lag!
The auto-balancer is equipped with a 32-axis gyro sensor!
It will be sure to keep the wearer from falling unless the wearer wants to!
Were not you going to fight fairly?!
What do you think of this lightness?!
These electro shoes use electromagnetic induction on both feet
to allow for instant evasive action!
I will get her when she lands!
Wh-What is this?
A capture gun to use against villains.
The capture nets are in cartridges, and you can fire up to five before reloading!
Who developed all of these items?
It was me, Mei Hatsume!
Everyone from the support companies,
the choice is clear-Mei Hatsume, Mei Hatsume, Mei Hatsume!
What is she, a politician?
And now, I will talk about the next support item!
There is still more?
Ten Minutes Later
I have presented each and every last one of them.
I have nothing left to say!
The End
H-Hatsume is out of bounds.
Iida advances to the second round!
You tricked me...!
I am sorry.
I used you.
I hate you!
Iida's earnest, so she probably said some things
that sounded good to get him on board.
Hatsume's not just honest,
she will also use any means to reach her goal.
Amazing...
We are going to keep right on going with the fifth match!
Even though he is wearing a belt, he will not transform!
From the hero course, it is Yuga Aoyama!
Bonjour.
Versus-
Is something going to come out of those horns?
Well?
From the hero course, it is Mina Ashido!
My first match is a piece of cake!
I will return those words right back at you.
Mina, you can do it!
Aoyama, get her!
Beat her like in those fighting games where their clothes get ripped off!
What are you, scum?
A match between Aoyama and Ashido.
Considering their Quirks...
Aoyama will probably attack from a distance with his laser.
So the match will be decided by how well Ashido can slip
through Aoyama's attacks and turn it into a close combat match.
But there is nothing to use as cover on the stage,
so Ashido might be at a slight disadvantage.
Now, why do not we get moving?
Fifth match, start!
The early bird gets the worm!
Whoops!
Since we were on the same team for combat training,
I know all about your Quirk!
Same goes for me!
There is just one thing that is different.
At the fitness test-
If I shoot for more than a second, I get a stomachache.
That is what you said!
You are...
My... My stomach...
Now!
Oh no, my precious belt!
And my pants!
I will finish it...
Aoyama has fainted!
Ashido advances to the second round!
Aoyama's knocked out!
Ashido's easy victory is indisputable!
Mina's amazing!
If only Aoyama and Ashido's Quirks were switched...!
You are too much of a scumbag.
The match unfolded as I expected, but I misjudged Ashido's physical strength.
Even during the Quirk assessment test, she placed ninth out of everyone,
including the boys.
It was not because of her Quirk-she is got excellent physical abilities.
Now, we have got no time to lose!
Let us move on to the sixth match!
Hey, I said get back to work!
Offense and defense in one body!
The dark samurai accompanied by Dark Shadow!
From the hero course, it is Fumikage Tokoyami!
Versus-
All-purpose Creation!
She was admitted through recommendations, so her abilities are certified!
From the hero course, it is Momo Yaoyorozu!
Midoriya, what do you think of this match?
I think time will be the key.
Time?
It is just as Mr. Present Mic says,
I am up against Tokoyami with Dark Shadow, offense and defense in one body.
In addition, Tokoyami can bring out Dark Shadow with no time lag,
so there is no doubt he will start with a preemptive strike.
If I create a simple shield that does not take much time and block Tokoyami's attack...
If I just give myself enough time to make a weapon-
Sixth match, start!
Go, Dark Shadow!
Got it!
Quickly create a shield-
Next, a weapon-
I cannot collect my thoughts!
His attacks have stopped?
Now!
Yaoyorozu!
Out of bounds!
Tokoyami advances to the second round!
An overwhelming victory!
A completely overwhelming victory!
Tokoyami's Dark Shadow!
Could it be the greatest Quirk ever?
No...
I could not do anything...
Nothing...
Tokoyami's too amazing.
I cannot believe he forced her out of bounds
just by focusing his attacks on the shield Yaoyozoru made.
He was trying not to hurt her?
That is how easy it was for him, huh?
She must feel really frustrated...
Okay, let us move on!
Next up-
The seventh match is a match-up between redundant Quirks!
Eijiro Kirishima Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu
Manly and passionate steel!
From the hero course, it is Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu!
All right!
Versus-
Manly and passionate hardening!
From the hero course, it is Eijiro Kirishima!
Even our intros are the same?!
Go, Tetsutetsu!
Win like Ibara did!
Get a hold of yourself.
Let us start this passionate seventh match!
Player Waiting Room 2
Good work, Iida.
Oh, Urarak-
You are not like yourself at all!
Your brow's all wrinkled!
My brow?
Oh, it is just my nerves...
Must have reached my brow.
I see...
You are up against that Bakugo, after all...
Yeah, I am really scared.
But you know, after seeing a match like yours, Iida...
Like mine?
Uraraka!
Deku!
Huh?
You do not want to watch the others' matches?
Most ended quickly, and now Kirishima is up against someone from Class B.
That did not hurt at all!
That did not hurt, either!
Then, next... soon...
But, well, I do not think even Bakugo would use a full-strength explosion on a girl...
He would.
Everyone is trying to become number one to make their dreams come true.
Player Waiting Room 1
Even if it is not Kacchan, no one would think about holding back.
You have helped me so much, Uraraka.
That is why I thought maybe I could help you a little.
A plan to use your Quirk against Kacchan-
It is rough, but I came up with something.
Oh, is not that great, Uraraka?
Thanks,
Deku.
But, it is fine.
You are amazing, Deku.
I keep seeing more and more amazing sides to you.
During the cavalry battle, I thought it would be easier to team up with friends,
but now that I think about it, I might have been trying to rely on you.
That is why, when Iida said he would challenge you,
it actually made me feel a little embarrassed.
Uraraka...
That is why it is fine.
Everyone is facing the future and trying their hardest.
That means we are all rivals, right?
That is why...
Let us meet in the finals!
The two guys with the same Quirks!
Tetsutetsu versus Kirishima!
A head-to-head fistfight!
The winner is-
Both contestants down!
It is a draw!
In the case of a draw, after they recover,
the winner will be determined by a simple contest, like arm wrestling.
Their ability was the same, too?
I like passionate guys like that.
They are inspiring.
I would like a sidekick like that.
While we wait for Tetsutetsu and Kirishima to recover,
we will start the next match!
Katsuki Bakugo Ochaco Uraraka
Next might be the most disturbing match-up.
I almost do not want to watch...
Uraraka...
Do your best!
The eighth and last match of the first round!
He was kind of famous in middle school!
This is not the face of a regular person!
From the hero course, it is Katsuki Bakugo!
Versus-
She is the one I am rooting for!
From the hero course, it is Ochaco Uraraka!
Eighth match, start!
Preview
Oh, this is, you know, the preview...
Uraraka, there is no spirit in your words.
But I guess that makes sense, since your first match is against Kacchan.
But I will do it.
In order to become a hero and let my parents take it easy!
Deku, let us meet in the finals!
Yeah, good luck, Uraraka!
Next time, Bakugo vs. Uraraka!
The meteor shower falling from the sky will be the path to victory!
Go beyond!
Next time: Bakugo vs. Uraraka
Plus Ultra!
